review: I just got it and Amazon is already asking for a review.  It works.  Set up was straight forward.  Since it is so small, you obviously have to have the remote.  I like the fact that the remove is wireless and non-directional.  I am only using Netflix and it works great.As long as it continues to work, I am a happy camper.  I wish there was a way to turn it off other than pulling the plug.
author: H. McNaspy "Spade5"

review: Works GREAT, easy to install and fast, fast, fast. We love it!

review: I wasn't sure what the big difference between the stick and the box was except for storage capacity and size. In this case, smaller is better for me. Although it juts out oddly from the side of my TV, it works wonderfully. The picture is better than I expected, and the setup was super easy. No complaints yet!

review: I could not get the stick to connect to the internet on 1 TV, but connected up on another works great simple to use controller could be a bit bigger. All in all good buy

review: Works great.  We have watched live streaming on Sling, Netflixs, HBO, ESPN with no issues.  We love it.  You can easily do without cable with the Amazon HD antenna and the Fire Stick in the Kansas City area.  So much cheaper.

review: Works very well, quite a change from watching Netflix on my I pad. Very easy installation and set up. Love it, well worth the $39!
